ing: 1 (1 ounce) packet dry au jus mix
n: Mississippi Roast - Slow Cooker Pepperoncini Pot Roast
des: "Slow cooker roast recipe, also called Pepperoncini Roast. Serve with egg noodles or mashed."
ins:
Place roast in a slow cooker. Form a pocket in the top of roast and place butter, pepperoncini peppers, ranch dressing mix, and au jus mix in the pocket.
Cook on Low for 8 hours.
